objects.text: • Complete Apple Ecosystem • Seamless Integration • Powerful Performance

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Combo
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem: MacBook Pro, iPad, and iPhone in one package
• MacBook Pro featuring Retina Display with stunning visual clarity
• Sleek aluminum unibody design across all devices
• Seamless integration between devices with iCloud and Continuity features
• MacBook Pro with backlit keyboard and Force Touch trackpad
• iPad with high-resolution display, perfect for creative work and entertainment
• iPhone with Touch ID for enhanced security
• Latest iOS and macOS operating systems pre-installed
• Powerful performance for professional work and everyday tasks
• Perfect starter kit for Apple ecosystem enthusiasts
• Ideal for students, professionals, and creative individuals
• All devices in pristine condition with original packaging

banner_details:
This visually appealing promotional banner showcases a premium device bundle with a clean and modern aesthetic. The composition centers around a white circular frame which highlights the product image (id: `product_image`) consisting of a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone. Above the product, prominent bold headline text (`heading`) in dark gray conveys premium branding, followed by an eye-catching blue subheadline (`subheading`). A smaller supporting text (`description`) explains the product combo.

The price (`price`) is emphasized over a large blue gradient circle, providing visual contrast and immediate attention. A tagline (`tagline`) sits at the bottom, outlining key benefits. The call-to-action (CTA) comprises a blue button design (`cta_background`) with white text (`cta`), urging users to “SHOP NOW.” Soft gradient waves and floating blue dots subtly enrich the background (`background`), maintaining focus on the center content.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Gray: `#333333` (used in text)
- Blue: `#007AFF` (subheadline, accents)
- Gradient Blue: `#5AC8FA` to `#007AFF` (price badge)
- Background Gradient: `#F0F0F0` to `#D1D1D6`
- White: `#FFFFFF` (price text, main circle)
product_color: The product image features a sleek set of Apple devices — a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone — all unified by a minimalist silver-gray hardware and strikingly immersive display visuals. The overall color palette combines metallic Silver Gray (#C0C0C0), Deep Black (#000000) from the keyboards and screen borders, and subtle Sky Blue (#A3C8E8) from the iPad's space-themed wallpaper. On the MacBook screen, a tranquil Sunset Gradient blends Warm Pink (#ECA3B2), Lavender Purple (#C9B5E1), and Earthy Brown (#8C6E5D), drawing attention to the vivid screen. The colors are harmoniously blended in the background but remain highlighted through sharp contrasts, enhancing the product’s premium feel.
